body.name: USX MOUNT Ultra-Slim Full Motion TV Wall Mount for 37-90 inch Flat Screen/LED/4K TV, TV Mount Dual Swivel Articulating 6 Arms Tilt Wall Mount TV Bracket Max VESA 600x400mm, Fits 8/16/ 24Studs
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 11 hrs 38 mins
features: ✅ [Wide Compatibility] USX-MOUNT high quality steel wall mount is suitable for most 37" - 90" flat or curved TVs with VESA patterns ranging from 200 x 100mm to 600 x 400mm. It is compatible with wood studs, concrete and brick walls up to 24 inches. Suitable for oversized TVs.

✅ [Adjustable viewing comfort & Glare reduction] Our TV wall mount with double articulating arms includes +5°/-20° tilt, ±45° swivel (maximum swivel angle depends on your TV), and mounting adjustments allowing perfect TV leveling. All of these features will make your TV flexible, say goodbye to annoying glare, and allow for better viewing depending on your seating in the room.

✅ [Easy Installation] Easy to install with detailed instructions and all included hardware in a pre-labeled bag (notes can help you distinguish which screws you will use). Warm Tips: In order to avoid customers misusing concrete anchor bolts directly on dowels or drywall and causing some safety problems, we remove concrete anchor bolts from our package. If you need 10X50mm concrete, please contact us.
✅ [Space Saving] This full-motion TV wall mount can pull out 11.96 inches and retract 1.49 inches, with a maximum weight of 120 pounds, saving you valuable space and making your house look neater.

Ultra-Slim Full Motion TV Mount Change your point of view. No need to buy another piece of bulky furniture. Just match the VESA mounting-hole pattern on the back of your TV to one of our mounts that you’ve been eyeing and you’re good to go. Our Ultra-Slim Full Motion TV– can get your TV 45% closer to the wall Wall Mount tilts and swivels for optimal viewing and glare reduction and – get this than our other full motion mounts! Simple to install too – we’ve included all the hardware and instructions you’ll need –you just bring the tools! Hang USX MOUNT

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mount is awesome holds my 86 in tv perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a thinner low profile mount that’s adjustable and this works perfectly….would buy again for another room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Tilt mechanism not strong enough to keep it from sliding all the way to 20 degrees
reviews.reviewText: 77" Samsung Oled well under the claimed weight limit and where the majority of the weight is even low and centered! Leaned forward all the way to 20 degrees multiple times and scared the living hell out of me. Had to take the tv off and inspect what was going on. Ended up tightening not just the 2 bolts your supposed to, but also the 2 other "hinge point" bolts that are on each side. You will not be able to adjust the tilt just by the top bolt if you do this. Product needs to go back to the engineering department.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Tilt is flawed design
reviews.reviewText: Tilt depends on 2 simple screws. Not strong enough to hold 77” Samsung QN77S90C at 78 lbs. without falling to maximum tilt. Also, top support bar should be one solid piece for maximum support, requires assembly with split in the middle. It will technically hold the weight of the TV, but seems like a bad design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty solid and slim but no adjustment for level
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I wanted a slim as possible mount behind my pretty thick fire tv and have an antique house with unusual stud spacing. BLUF it works pretty well but I had to jettison one of the extensions that make it reach 24” stud spacing. Would’ve been nice if they had been more adjustable.My main compliant w this product is the tilt mechanism does not lock into the desired place well and slips a bit. I can’t get it to stay exactly where I want. It uses two Allen wrench screws and just sheer tension to stay in place but the screws aren’t strong enough. If I crank on them anymore I’ll strip them. Tv wants to fall forward so I’ll try at a later date to see if a I can adjust the brackets on the back of tv to reduce the center of gravity.Also be forewarned, this does not have a level adjustment so get your level right with the template. I spent an exhaustive amount of time dealing with confirming stud locations and level esa but the quirks in my antique house still make the tv seem a bit off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The main selling point is the ultra-slim-low-profile design
reviews.reviewText: Not bad, at a discounted price. If you are handy, it will need some simple fiddling to get it right, but it is possible.As some reviewers have mentioned, the tilt needs some work. The manual does not mention it, but there are other larger bolts, which support the tilt function, that just need simple tightening to hold. I don’t plan to use the tilt feature, so I just tightened the bolts so the mount does not tilt. If you need tilt, just tighten the lower bolts enough and use the two smaller tilt screws mentioned in the manual.For the full asking price, I feel the top support bar should be one solid piece for maximum support, it requires assembly with a split in the middle. It will technically hold the weight of the TV, but not the better design, as well as the plastic vertical brackets, could lead to some leveling issues if the mount is extended.For my use case, the main selling point is the ultra-slim-close-to-wall design, for a full motion mount. It is fairly easy to make this mount work, if you are handy. I don’t plan to use the tilt or pull away from the wall (comes in handy to get behind the TV and install cables, then fold the mount in flat to the wall).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Really like the sturdiness of the mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds up our 50” TV well
reviews.reviewText: This is a good, durable wall mount. It is pretty sturdy, definitely a little heavier than I was expecting. It is way to install though, it comes with everything you need set it up. The TV look great up on the wall as well.
